title: Registration Open for Nirman Hackathon 2025
content: Early bird registration is now open for our flagship hackathon event. Limited seats available.

title: Incubation Center Applications Now Open
content: Apply for our 6-month incubation program with mentorship, funding support, and workspace facilities.

title: Guest Lecture by Successful Alumni
content: Join us for an inspiring session with our alumni who have successfully launched their startups.
